attributes.action: To ensure that the BBC act responsibly to its Audience & Subscribers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure that the BBC act responsibly to its audience & subscribers and Trust and to ensure that the standards that are clearly outlined in its Charter are upheld at all times in relation to Ruusell Brand & Jonathan Ross have put their employer the BBC into disrepute & that their broacast on BBC radio 2 on Saturday 18 October 2008 was offensive to its audience.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
